name: Notebook Entries Vol. 1
description:
8 Short Stories.

A Short Horror Game focused on creating tighter circumstances in mind to elevate Tension, Creativity, Monsters and Gameplay.
There's bound to be 1...that caresses your Fear.


Immerse yourself in...


SplitScreen



Shhhhh...Don't look away...

Genre: Sound Tension


Alone//White Canvas

Non Existent.
Non Existent.
Non Existent.


Just a Peep



Snooping Around Can Attract That Same Creepy Energy..

Genre: Monotone Atmospheric Tension


Intermission



The Watcher...

Genre: [Redacted]


I Think I Hit Something



Whatever you hit......it has wings..

Genre: Suspense


don't look UP



Phobias aren't meant to come alive..

Genre: Creepy Walking Simulator


Repeat.Repeat.Compulsion.



My Mind's Mine...

Genre: Audio Point and Click.


a Sheep's Gun



His Gun, His House, His Sacrifice..

Genre: Action Survival


Runtime: 1 Hour.
Inspired by Anthology Horror//Retro Movies.
Thank you for supporting my work.
